channel.title: Raid on G⌬RBE
channel.description: Recent content in Raid on G⌬RBE

item.title: Create RAID0 with mdadm
item.description: RAID (Redundant Array of Inexpensive Disks) is a data storage virtualization technology that combines multiple physical disk drive components into one or more logical units for the purposes of data redundancy, performance improvement, or both.
